Package: org.grails.datastore.mapping.redis

[Java] Class RedisDatastore

      • org.grails.datastore.mapping.redis.RedisDatastore
      • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
        DisposableBean, InitializingBean

        @java.lang.SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
public class RedisDatastore
extends AbstractDatastore

        A Datastore implementation for the Redis key/value datastore.

        Authors:
        Graeme Rocher
        Since:
        1.0
